commit message: Fixed Bug: Keepright Bugs cannot be changed. Only commented.
Mapdust Bugs will Display other Icon if undefined Type is received
Fix: The state of Keepright Bugs could not be changed

Removed Formattings File and switched back to manual formatting since it
turned out that auto format is not always the best solution

Switched to Android Studio
Reformat Code by default Settings
Add Bug Menu Entry now visible in ActionBar
Default Zoom Level on App start is now 20

Moved CommentAdapter to BugEditorActivity
CommentAdapter now recycles old Views
Removed Dialog Box for new Comments. Replaced by an Edittext
Fixed a bug where icons were not displayed the right size on large screens. Thanks herrbert74\!
